name: Yar Muhammad
tagline: I build cross-platform mobile apps and intelligent automation workflows.

bullets: Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile apps for healthcare, eCommerce, and productivity.
Integrated GPT-4 and VAPI.AI to build intelligent voice assistants for real-time call handling.
Built automation workflows using n8n and Make (Integromat) for CRM/API integrations.
Implemented image processing automation using Python.

education.institution: FG Quaid e Azam Degree College Chaklala Rawalpindi

projects.title: EyeScan App
projects.summary: Image capture app with watermark/logo overlay, sharing, and email functionality.
projects.description: A comprehensive image capture application designed for healthcare imaging solutions with advanced watermark and logo overlay capabilities.
features: Real-time image capture with camera integration
Dynamic watermark and logo overlay system
Image processing with Python Pillow library
projects.challenges: Implementing real-time image processing while maintaining app performance.
projects.solution: Optimized image processing pipeline using Python backend services.

projects.title: VAPI Voice Assistant
projects.summary: Voice assistant for smart scheduling using GPT-4 + VAPI.AI.
projects.description: An intelligent voice assistant system that leverages GPT-4 and VAPI.AI for natural language processing and smart scheduling capabilities.
projects.challenges: Creating seamless voice interactions with minimal latency.
projects.solution: Implemented efficient API caching and optimized voice processing pipeline.

projects.title: Dolibarr External Form
projects.summary: Custom UI external form with Dolibarr CRM integration.
projects.description: A custom UI external form with seamless Dolibarr CRM integration for enhanced customer data collection and management.
projects.challenges: Ensuring data consistency between external forms and CRM system.
projects.solution: Implemented robust API integration with comprehensive error handling.

projects.title: Les Femmes App
projects.summary: Feature development for product creation and draft continuation.
projects.description: Enhanced mobile application features for product creation workflows and draft management functionality.
projects.challenges: Maintaining data integrity across draft sessions.
projects.solution: Implemented local storage with cloud synchronization for seamless experience.

projects.title: eCommerce Platform
projects.summary: React Native interface enhancements with backend product workflow integration.
projects.description: Comprehensive eCommerce platform enhancements focusing on user experience and backend integration for improved product workflow management.
projects.challenges: Optimizing performance for large product catalogs.
projects.solution: Implemented efficient pagination and caching strategies.
